speaker: David Muir
sentence: When you say in your opinion millions of illegal votes, that is something that is extremely fundamental to our functioning democracy, a fair and free election.
politifact_statement: Muir "What you have presented so far has been debunked. It's been called false."Trump "No, it hasn't. Take a look at the Pew reports."
verified_claim: There's one study that came out of Pew in 2008 that showed 14 percent of people who voted were noncitizens.
verified_claim_article_title: Sean Spicer wrongly uses Pew study to bolster claim that non-citizens vote in large numbers
